list_definition.mean_english: người có tài nói tiếng bụng
list_definition.definition: a professional entertainer who can speak so that his voice seems to come from some other person or place, especially from a dummy which he controls

list_ex_of_english: All of them have been edited digitally so that they have mouths similar to ventriloquist dummies.
His only clue is an old ventriloquist dummy.
He is nothing but the puppet of ventriloquists.
The ventriloquist dummy is controlled by the one hand of the ventriloquist.
A number of modern ventriloquists have developed a following as the public taste for live comedy grows.
After being badly burned in a household accident, she was given a ventriloquist's dummy by her artist father as part of her recovery.
Another feature to the show was the addition of giant trees on each side of the stage from which hung ventriloquist dummies from the branches.
That was what led me to say that they were puppets—although ventriloquists' dummies might have been a more accurate description.
